text: Hiori, you are in a better mood than usual today!
It's been a little while since the three of us met like this.
So I was wondering if Mano would come soon too.

Buuut────
Is that really all there is? Is there actually something else?

...Recently at work, I've been working with a lot
of older people, so I've had to be very careful not to be rude.

So I thought... it would be nice to be able to be
with my friends like this, without worrying about it.

She's going to be late because of the shooting,
so she's telling us not to worry about her.
Right! I'll send her a stamp.

Mano's role is a reserved but strong-willed girl.
I read the original story!

Yes.
Someone who is willing to talk to you face to face.

I feel like she's a little similar to Mano,
so I'm looking forward to the broadcast.
